# PSPDFKitDotNetExample

a simple example of using the PSPDFKit .NET library

- firstDocument.pdf is opened
- instant.json is applied to firstDocument.pdf
- document editor is created using firstDocument.pdf
- document editor merges secondDocument.pdf to firstDocument.pdf

[working web version of the same set of operations](
https://pspdfkit.com/playground?%%2BXG4gICAgdGkuY29uY2F0KFt7IHR5cGU6IFwiY3VzdG9tXCIsIHRpdGxlOiBcIkNsaWNrIG1lXCIsIG9uUHJlc3MgfV0pXG4gICk7XG59KTtcbiIsImNzcyI6Ii8qIEFkZCB5b3VyIENTUyBoZXJlICovXG4ifQ%3D%3D) - press the "Click Me" toolbar button in the upper right corner to perform the operation set
